term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A name given to the study or project. Project title should be fewer than 30 words, such as a title of a grant proposal or a publication.

term_description: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.

term_label: Maximum Distance Above Surface In Metres
term_description: The greater distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The upper limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in metres.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_label: Minimum Distance Above Surface In Metres
term_description: The lesser distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

term_description: The status of the use of the dwc:scientificName as a label for a taxon. Requires taxonomic opinion to define the scope of a dwc:Taxon. It must be linked to a specific taxonomic reference that defines the concept.

term_description: The content of this term should include no embellishments, prefixes, headers or other additions made to the text. Abbreviations must not be expanded and supposed misspellings must not be corrected. Lines or breakpoints between blocks of text that could be verified by seeing the original labels or images of them may be used. Examples of material entities include preserved specimens, fossil specimens, and material samples. Best practice is to use UTF-8 for all characters. Best practice is to add comment ‚ÄúverbatimLabel derived from human transcription‚Äù in dwc:occurrenceRemarks.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.
technology_label: Spatial Transcriptomics Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (ST-FISH)

term_description: The verbatim original latitude of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.
